document.title: A discrete-time approach to process modeling and direct digital control.
document.abstract: The purpose of this study was to investigate the advantages offered by a z-transform approach to direct digital control applications. A discrete-time modeling package was developed for modeling process input/output data using a general second-order pulse transfer function. Also, a z-transform controller presented in the literature was modified to yield a control algorithm which gives significant improvement over conventional DOC algorithms.
